review: We live on a lake and don't have much indoor time right now.  That being said, what little time we have had to use the Fire TV Stick we have enjoyed it.  This rating may turn from a 4 to a 5 when we really put it to test in the fall and winter.
author: Carol Johnson

review: The biggest issue I had was with the remote control. It's hard to open. Otherwise everything else works great and a great price helps a lot also.
author: michelle moore

review: Awesome.  Don't need to use my Blu ray and fire 🔥 stick plays my music and Netflix and prime.  Recommended for everyone.
author: Robert fields

review: Excellent selection...No one will regret with this device...
author: Biju

review: works great, As long as I have no more issues with the "blue screen of death". Got it all the time after watching for a few hours, toke the advice of another reviewer, reset wireless router, unplug and plug tv back in, and remove stick then replace, have not had any problems after that
author: kelly

review: Great item but had some issues when the power went out of reconnecting to my wifi. Had to restart the stick to get it to reconnect. Other than that it's exactly what I wanted at a great price.
author: Bookworm10
